Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Lounge', 2: 'Constellia'}
{3: 'Constellia\\nLounge'}
{3: 'Tea leaves settle at the bottom of the cups as hot water is poured in. Within moments, a delicate aroma rises from the porcelain.'}
{3: 'Balancing the saucers, you walk toward a dark mahogany desk.'}
{3: 'Across from the desk, the ruler of Kowloong reclines on a velvet chaise lounge, reviewing papers. Three crystal-blue screens hover in the air, filled with text and images.'}
{3: 'She taps, and the holographic pages scroll and change. Her unwavering focus holds your gaze until she finally looks up.'}
{3: 'Noticing your stare, she lifts her head and looks over. When your eyes meet, the focused, slightly cold look on her face softens just a little.'}
{2: '(Pass her one of the cups of tea)', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Still not finished?', 3: '21'}
{3: 'She told you earlier, through a terminal call, that she had cleared some work in advance so the two of you could meet.'}
{3: "Neither of you foresaw the holiday rush adding so many tasks. Now, with Constellia's celebration moments away, she's still buried in work."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Just one last part. Don't worry, I'll make it in time for the opening.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lets out a quiet breath and massages her temples, a faint trace of fatigue lingering between her brows.'}
{2: 'You should take a break. Otherwise, you might not even enjoy the festival later.', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Want me to take over from here?', 3: '32'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "This work isn't something just anyone can handle. Even the top commandants from F.O.S. College would struggle...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But you, 【kuroname】... you might just manage. Think of it as a good test of your governance skills.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll review everything afterward, so don't worry about making mistakes. Just show me what you can do.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pats the empty spot beside her.'}
{2: '(Move over and sit beside Qu)', 3: '40'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Alright, here's what you need to watch out for...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu briefly explains the important details, then transfers partial access from her terminal.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'll leave the rest to you. I need a quick rest. If anything's unclear, just ask me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she hands over control, she finally seems to relax. She leans gently against your shoulder and closes her eyes.'}
{3: "She doesn't respond. Her warm breath brushes your neck, tickling lightly."}
{3: 'You steady yourself and turn to the screen in front of you.'}
{2: 'First is the "Hexabridge Port Southern District Resource Allocation Proposal"...'}
{3: 'You quietly read out the key points of each file, then write your responses, adding your own judgment and suggestions.'}
{3: 'Sometimes Qu stays silent, as if silently approving. Other times, she offers soft guidance. You quickly get a feel for the logic and priorities, and the work begins to flow more smoothly.'}
{3: 'She seems more at ease now, breathing slowly and evenly beside you.'}
{2: "This is the last file. Let's see... oh...", 3: '60'}
{3: "It's a proposal to set aside a plot of land in Kowloong to build you a private residence. And not just any home—something closer to a small estate."}
{3: 'She seems to notice your reaction and opens her eyes. Her gaze sweeps across the screen, and a faint, knowing smile appears on her lips.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Plenty of people on my side have had their eye on you for a long time, Commandant. They keep suggesting I find a reason to bring you back to Kowloong, as my partner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The meaning behind this proposal is pretty obvious. So, 【kuroname】, what are you going to do with it?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll accept it with gratitude.", 3: '66', 4: 'Maybe I should turn it down. It feels a little too much.', 5: '71'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "So honest. If those people heard you'd accepted the offer, they'd probably break into song on the spot.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You laugh together, but in the end, you mark the mansion proposal as "Rejected."'}
{3: 'Whatever motives might be behind it, that kind of gift was never something you asked for.'}
{3: 'Whatever motives might be behind it, that kind of gift was never something you asked for.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Still, that reminds me, I should prepare a permanent room for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Let's put it in the inner courtyard of Kowloong. A room for my partner, in my own residence. It only makes sense.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Don't turn me down. When the time comes, I'll pick out decorations you like myself.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her tone is gentle, but leaves no room to argue.'}
{3: 'She sits up straight, stretches her neck, and some of the weariness fades from her face.'}
{3: "She takes the terminal and reviews every approved file. By the end, she's smiling with clear satisfaction."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'As expected from you, 【kuroname】. Well done.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With all documents marked as "Processed," the long work session finally comes to a close.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1076.jpg'}
{3: 'Just then, you hear music and cheers drifting in through the window. Fireworks begin to light up the sky.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Looks like the festival has begun.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Come on, 【kuroname】. Let's go take a look.", 4: '1'}
